messages.title: My action plan for Castle Vale, Erdington and Kingstanding
messages.content: Erdington Constituency is my home and I love living here. However I want to help make it even better for us all. Over the last year I have been consulting with local residents to produce our action plan for Erdington Constituency these are some of our priorities to help make our home even better in the years ahead:

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support planting an avenue of trees alongside the new Chester Road Sprint route, bringing more greenery to our area.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A CLEANER STREETS, SCRAP GARDEN TAX
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Obtaining the best street cleaning record in Birmingham while leading the council. As your MP, I would scrap Labour’s Garden Tax.
Championing employment opportunities such as the Castle Vale Retail Park. If elected as your MP, I am committed to fighting for more local jobs.
Lobbying the Conservative Government to secure the investment to resurface more of our roads than ever before in Castle Vale as your councillor.
Worked with local businesses to secure funding for the local police tasking team which has significantly cut crime in our area.
Committed to saving the Walk-in Centre and to the campaign to expand the opening hours.

issues.environment: Support planting an avenue of trees alongside the new Chester Road Sprint route.
issues.health: Committed to saving the Walk-in Centre and to the campaign to expand the opening hours.

housing.content: Obtaining the best street cleaning record in Birmingham while leading the council. As your MP, I would scrap Labour’s Garden Tax.

images.caption: Support planting an avenue of trees alongside the new Chester Road Sprint route.
Worked with local businesses to secure funding for the local police tasking team which has significantly cut crime in our area.
Leading the campaign to save Erdington High Street.
Leading from the front to protest against cuts to the opening times of the local Walk-in Centre.
